AKENR.IS.summary: Akenerji Elektrik Ãretim A.S. engages in the generation, transmission, and trading of electricity in Turkey and internationally. The company operates hydroelectric, wind, and natural gas combined cycle power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,224 megawatts. It is also involved in natural gas trading business. Akenerji Elektrik Ãretim A.S. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AKSEN.IS.summary: Aksa Enerji Ãretim A.S., an independent power producer, produces and sells electricity in Turkey and Africa. The company produces energy from coal, fuel oil, biogas, natural gas, wind, and hydroelectricity. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 7 power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,946 MW. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Aksa Enerji Ãretim A.S. is a subsidiary of Kazanci Holding A.S.

AKSUE.IS.long_name: Aksu Enerji ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
AKSUE.IS.summary: Aksu Enerji ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the operation of hydroelectric power plant in Turkey. It produces and distributes hydroelectric power. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Isparta, Turkey.

AYEN.IS.summary: Ayen Enerji A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, distribution, and trade of electricity in Turkey. It generates electricity from hydroelectric, wind, and natural gas sources. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Ankara, Turkey. Ayen Enerji A.S. is a subsidiary of Aydiner Insaat AS.

AYGAZ.IS.summary: Aygaz A.S., together with its subsidiaries, purchases and delivers liquid petroleum gas (LPG) to retailers for distribution to customers in Turkey. The company operates through three segments: Gas and Petroleum Products, Electricity, and Other. It also manufactures LPG cylinders, LPG tanks, valves, and other supplementary materials; and cylinder-hood sets and hoses, regulators, small cylinder gas devices, barbecues, and patio heaters. In addition, the company distributes LPG autogas, cylinder gas, and bulk gas; markets LPG-operated devices; carries out LPG marine transportation activities; sells carboy water; and trades in fuel and lubricants through its autogas stations. Further, it engages in the delivery of natural gas to customers through pipelines; and liquefied natural gas to customers through cryogenic vehicles. Additionally, it purchases, builds, rents, and operates vessels, which transport crude oil, petroleum products, liquid petroleum gas, natural gas and solid, liquid, and liquefied products; and generates, distributes, and sells electricity. It operates with total 362 MW of installed capacity with eight 265-MW hydroelectric power plants located in Karaman, Samsun, and Mersin, as well as a natural gas cycle plant of 97 MW in Kocaeli. The company provides its services through 2,383 cylinder gas dealers; and 1,718 autogas stations. Aygaz A.S. was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Sisli, Turkey. Aygaz A.S. is a subsidiary of KoÃ§ Holding A.S.

ENJSA.IS.summary: Enerjisa Enerji A.S. operates as an electricity distribution and retail company in Turkey. As of December 31, 2019, the company had 11.2 million distribution network connections and 9.9 million customers of retail electricity market. It also provides marketing, energy management, and energy consultancy services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ESEN.IS.summary: Esenboga Elektrik Ãretim A.S. invests in solar energy sector in Turkey. The company owns 30 solar power plants with a capacity of 33.79 MWp. It also provides EPC services for solar power plants. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey. Esenboga Elektrik Ãretim A.S. is a subsidiary of Naturel Yenilenebilir Enerji Ticaret A.S.

NATEN.IS.summary: Naturel Yenilenebilir Enerji Ticaret A.S. operates in the renewable energy sector in Turkey. It develops and operates wind, solar, hydro, geothermal, and biomass power plants. The company also provides wind and solar measurement, and offshore measurement platform services; and wave power, hydrogen and bio energy, CSP technology, and carbon capture/storage services. In addition, it offers solutions for power transmission lines. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

ODAS.IS.long_name: Odas Elektrik Üretim Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
ODAS.IS.summary: Odas Elektrik Ãretim Sanayi Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells electricity by natural gas combined cycling in Turkey and internationally. It also establishes, commissions, hires, operates, and leases electricity production plants. The company operates a natural gas combined cycle power plant with an installed capacity of 140 Megawatt (MW); a solar energy power plant with an installed capacity of 0.25 MW; and a hydroelectricity power plant with an installed capacity of 8.2 MW. In addition, it produces, imports, and wholesales natural gas, liquefied natural gas (LNG), and compressed natural gas (CNG) to exporters, LNG and CNG clients, wholesale companies, consumers, and other customers. Further, the company extracts, purchases, manufactures, imports, exports, sells, and installs various natural stone and mineral ores that primarily include gold, antimony, and coal. Odas Elektrik Ãretim Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ORGE.IS.long_name: Orge Enerji Elektrik Taahhüt Anonim Sirketi
ORGE.IS.summary: Orge Enerji Elektrik TaahhÃ¼t Anonim Sirketi provides electricity contracting services for residential and business construction projects in Turkey. It offers electrical contracting services for weak current systems, LV electrical contract works, and MV electrical contract works, as well as construction services. The company was formerly known as ORGE Enerji Sistemleri Insaat Metal Ticaret ve TaahhÃ¼t A.S. and changed its name to Orge Enerji Elektrik TaahhÃ¼t Anonim Sirketi in June 2010. Orge Enerji Elektrik TaahhÃ¼t Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TRCAS.IS.summary: Turcas Petrol A.S., through its subsidiaries, operates in the fuel retail and lubricants, conventional energy, and renewable energy fields primarily in Turkey. The company engages in the operation of Shell-branded fuel stations that offer fuel products and lubricants. It operates a network of approximately 1,000 Shell branded fuel stations in Turkey. The company also produces, sells, and markets various lubricant products to the automotive industry; and energy, iron and steel, construction, mining, and general manufacturing sectors. In addition, it owns and operates eight fuel oil terminals and two LPG filling and storage facilities. Further, the company is involved in the power generation and natural gas wholesale businesses. It operates natural gas and geothermal power plants. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Turcas Petrol A.S. is a subsidiary of Aksoy Holding A.S.

ZOREN.IS.summary: Zorlu Enerji Elektrik Ãretim A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, distribution, retail trade, and sale of electricity and steam in Turkey and internationally. It also sells and installs solar panels; sells and distributes natural gas; constructs, manages, and maintains EV charging stations; and constructs industrial plants. As of December 31, 2019, the company had total installed capacity of 1,086 MW comprising 305 MW of geothermal energy, 272 MW of wind energy, and 119 MW of hydroelectric energy. It operates 7 hydroelectric, 3 wind, 4 geothermal, and 3 natural gas plants in Turkey; 1 wind farm in Pakistan; and 3 natural gas power plants in Israel. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
